trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于导航 UI 自动化树的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation clients view the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements on the desktop as a set of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objects arranged in a tree structure.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端查看[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素作为一套桌面上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>排列的树状结构中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker> class, a client application can navigate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree by selecting a view of the tree and stepping from one <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to another in a specified direction using the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetFirstChild%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetLastChild%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetPreviousSibling%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetNextSibling%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetParent%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker>类，客户端应用程序可以导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]按选择的树视图，并从一个单步执行树<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>到另一个在指定的方向使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetFirstChild%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetLastChild%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetPreviousSibling%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetNextSibling%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetParent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Navigating the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker> can result in cross-process calls and is not as efficient as locating an element using the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindFirst%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树进行<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker>可能导致跨进程调用且不是与查找元素使用一样有效<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindFirst%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> will navigate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> 将要导航的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素目录树的视图。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that do not match `condition` are skipped over when <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker> is used to navigate the element tree.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 不匹配的元素`condition`跳过时<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker>用于在元素树中导航。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how you can construct a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker> that navigates only among enabled elements.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何可以构造<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker>仅在启用元素之间导航。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that defines the view for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象定义 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> 对象的视图。

trans-unit.source: The condition that defines the view.
trans-unit.target: 定义视图的条件。

trans-unit.source: This is the value that was passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是传递给构造函数的值。

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as content controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个预定义的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" />，其中包含目录树中标记为内容控件的元素的视图。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ControlViewWalker> being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ControlViewWalker>用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。

trans-unit.source: The usage for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ContentViewWalker> is identical.
trans-unit.target: 使用情况<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ContentViewWalker>相同。

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个预定义的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" />，其中包含目录树中标记为控件的元素的视图。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ControlViewWalker> being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ControlViewWalker>用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the first child element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的第一个子元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可以拥有其他子元素，与当前视图条件不匹配，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回的第一个子元素将在后续处理过程返回作为第一个子级。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to retrieve the first child.
trans-unit.target: 从中检索第一个子级的元素。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the first child element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的第一个子元素。

trans-unit.source: The first child element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 第一个子元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可以拥有其他子元素，与当前视图条件不匹配，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回的第一个子元素将在后续处理过程返回作为第一个子级。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetFirstChild%2A> being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetFirstChild%2A>用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to retrieve the first child.
trans-unit.target: 从中检索第一个子级的元素。

trans-unit.source: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> to cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上要进行缓存的属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the first child element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> and caches properties and patterns.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的第一个子元素并缓存属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: The first child element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 第一个子元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回的第一个子元素将在后续处理过程返回作为第一个子级。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the last child element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的最后一个子元素。

trans-unit.target: 从中检索最后一个子级的元素。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the last child element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的最后一个子元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> that is the last child element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 作为最后一个子元素的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可以拥有其他子元素，与当前视图条件不匹配，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。

trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回最后一个子元素将在后续处理过程返回作为最后一个子级。

trans-unit.target: 从中检索最后一个子级的元素。

trans-unit.source: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> to cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上要进行缓存的属性和模式。

trans-unit.target: 检索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的最后一个子元素并缓存属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: The last element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个子元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的下一个同级元素。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可以具有其他同级元素，它们不匹配的当前视图状态，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.

trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回的下一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回作为下一个同级。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> from which to retrieve the next sibling.
trans-unit.target: 从中检索下一个同级元素的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next sibling element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的下一个同级元素。

trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the next sibling element will be returned as the next sibling on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回的下一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回作为下一个同级。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the parent element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的父元素。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回父元素作为父级返回在后续处理过程。

trans-unit.source: The element whose parent is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将返回其父级的元素。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the parent element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的父元素。

trans-unit.source: The parent element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified element is the root element in the tree, or if the parent element is not visible in the current view.
trans-unit.target: 父元素，或者，如果指定元素为目录树中的根元素或者父元素在当前视图中不可见，则为 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetParent%2A> being used to find the window element that contains a specified element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.GetParent%2A>正在用于查找包含指定的元素的窗口元素。

trans-unit.source: The element whose parent is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将返回其父级的元素。

trans-unit.source: A cache request object specifying members on the returned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> to cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上要进行缓存的成员。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the parent element of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> and caches properties and patterns.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的父元素并缓存属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: The parent element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified element is the root element in the tree, or the parent element is not visible in this view.
trans-unit.target: 父元素，或者，如果指定元素为目录树中的根元素或者父元素在此视图中不可见，则为 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回父元素作为父级返回在后续处理过程。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的上一同级元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可以具有其他同级元素，它们不匹配的当前视图状态，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回上一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回为上一个同级。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to retrieve the previous sibling.
trans-unit.target: 从中检索上一个同级的元素。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的上一同级元素。

trans-unit.source: The previous sibling element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 上一个同级元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可以具有其他同级元素，它们不匹配的当前视图状态，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回上一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回为上一个同级。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to retrieve the previous sibling.
trans-unit.target: 从中检索上一个同级的元素。

trans-unit.source: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> to cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上要进行缓存的属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> and caches properties and patterns.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的上一个同级并缓存属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: The previous sibling element, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 上一个同级元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可以具有其他同级元素，它们不匹配的当前视图状态，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.
trans-unit.target: 不保证元素返回上一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回为上一个同级。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> in the tree view used by this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 的此实例所使用的树视图中检索与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> 最接近的上级元素。

trans-unit.source: The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker> object is reached.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行规范化通过之前满足的视图条件的元素在祖先一系列在树中向上导航<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker>达到对象。

trans-unit.source: If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition.
trans-unit.target: 如果到达的根元素，即使它不满足视图条件，则返回的根元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于获取对引用的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的命中测试的元素。

trans-unit.source: The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Normalize%2A> to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能想要仅使用特定类型的元素，并且可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Normalize%2A>，确保无论最初检索到哪些元素，（例如，当滚动条获取输入的焦点），（如内容相关的元素最终检索元素）。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to start the normalization.
trans-unit.target: 从其开始规范化的元素。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the node itself, if it satisfies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" />, or the nearest parent or ancestor node that satisfies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索节点本身（如果它满足 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" />）或者检索满足 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" /> 的最接近的父级或上级节点。

trans-unit.source: The nearest <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> in the current view.
trans-unit.target: 当前视图中最接近的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沿上级链向上导航到达根元素，将返回根元素。

trans-unit.source: The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker> object is reached.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行规范化通过之前满足的视图条件的元素在祖先一系列在树中向上导航<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker>达到对象。

trans-unit.source: If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition.
trans-unit.target: 如果到达的根元素，即使它不满足视图条件，则返回的根元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于获取对引用的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的命中测试的元素。

trans-unit.source: The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Normalize%2A> to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能想要仅使用特定类型的元素，并且可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Normalize%2A>，确保无论最初检索到哪些元素，（例如，当滚动条获取输入的焦点），（如内容相关的元素最终检索元素）。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to start the normalization.
trans-unit.target: 从其开始规范化的元素。

trans-unit.source: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> to cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> 上要进行缓存的属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the node itself, if it satisfies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" />, or the nearest parent or ancestor node that satisfies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" />, and caches properties and patterns.
trans-unit.target: 检索节点本身（如果它满足 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" />）或者检索满足 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Condition" /> 的最接近的父级或上级节点，并缓存属性和模式。

trans-unit.source: The nearest <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> in the current view.
trans-unit.target: 当前视图中最接近的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沿上级链向上导航到达根元素，将返回根元素。

trans-unit.source: The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker> object is reached.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行规范化通过之前满足的视图条件的元素在祖先一系列在树中向上导航<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker>达到对象。

trans-unit.source: If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition.
trans-unit.target: 如果到达的根元素，即使它不满足视图条件，则返回的根元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于获取对引用的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的命中测试的元素。

trans-unit.source: The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Normalize%2A> to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能想要仅使用特定类型的元素，并且可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.Normalize%2A>，确保无论最初检索到哪些元素，（例如，当滚动条获取输入的焦点），（如内容相关的元素最终检索元素）。

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" /> containing a view of all the elements in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个预定义的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker" />，其中包含目录树中所有元素的视图。

trans-unit.source: If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ControlViewWalker> being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.ControlViewWalker>用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。

trans-unit.source: The usage for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.RawViewWalker> is identical.
trans-unit.target: 使用情况<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker.RawViewWalker>相同。
